# Increase Virulence (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 2]], [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[2nd Level Blackguard Spells|Blackguard 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM: [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]**

**Casting Time:** 1 minute

**Components:** V, S, M (licorice root)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Vial of poison or creature touched

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Player's Handbook II (WotC), pg. 115

*Ribbons of green and black energy engulf your hand and pass into the vial or creature you touch.*

You make the poison in a vial or a creature more lethal. The DCs for all saving throws against the poison increase by 2.
